name: sqlEnlightAnalyze
description: A build and release task for analyzing SQL code with SQL Enlight.
author: Ubitsoft

inputs.name: IncludeFilesPattern
inputs.label: Include Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regex pattern for matching .SQL files, which to be analyzed.

inputs.name: ExcludeFilesPattern
inputs.label: Exclude Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regex pattern for matching .SQL files, which to be excluded during the analysis.

inputs.name: ConnectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional SQL connection string, which to be used for loading analysis context.

inputs.name: ReportOutput
inputs.label: Report Output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output file for the generated report.

inputs.name: CustomProperties
inputs.label: Custom Properties
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom properties, which to be provided to the generated report.

inputs.name: IncludeRules
inputs.label: Include Rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of rules, which to be enabled during the analysis.

inputs.name: ExcludeRules
inputs.label: Exclude Rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of rules, which to be disabled during the analysis.

inputs.name: TemplateFile
inputs.label: Analysis Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional analysis template file, which to be used for the analysis.

inputs.name: FailOnAnyViolation
inputs.label: Fail On Violation
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, the task will fail if any rule violation is found.
